 Distributive law for cross product over union.  Theorem 103 of [Suppes] p. 52.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-2004.)
statement: xpundi $p |- ( A X. ( B u. C ) ) = ( ( A X. B ) u. ( A X. C ) ) $.
